com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter

Class DynamicColorsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter.DynamicColorsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    public class DynamicColorsAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    A simple base adapter to hold an array of colors and displays them in a adapter view.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

      • DynamicColorsAdapter

        public DynamicColorsAdapter(Integer[] colors,
                            int colorShape,
                            boolean alpha,
                            DynamicColorListener dynamicColorListener)
        Constructor to initialize an object of this class.
        Parameters:
        colors - The array of colors to be handled by this adapter.
        colorShape - The shape of the color swatches.
        alpha - true to enable alpha for the color.
        dynamicColorListener - The listener to get the callback when a color is selected.
